name: Screaming Chicken!/鸡你太美
description:
1. It‘s a corny thing to say，this is a really awesome party game. Slap your friends’ controllers out of their hands while playing on the same couch. Throwing bombs to each other and keeping yourself safe. Easy to pick up, emphasizing strategy over twitch reaction.

2. Every player controls a screaming chicken. Many awesome skins, mysterious drop items, all destructible land and a lot of bombs. All above the keywords that perfectly describe a round of Screaming Chicken!

3. Our game based on the physics simulation technological framework, so there is a lot of unexpected feedback.
